Sentencas: High temperature cleaning of producer gas from biomass gasification has been investigated with a granular filter.
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas

Sentencas: Field tests were performed for several hours on a single filter element at about 550 degrees C.
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas

Sentencas: The results show cake filtration on the granular material and indicate good filtration of the biomass gasification producer gas.
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas

Sentencas: The relatively low pressure drop over the filter during filtration is comparable to those of bag filters.
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas

Sentencas: The granular filter can operate with high filtration velocities compared to bag filters and maintain high efficiency and a low residual pressure.
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas

Sentencas: This work is a part of the BioSOFC-up project that has a goal of utilizing the producer gas from the gasification plant in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas

Sentencas: The BioSOFC-up project will continue to the end of 2007.
Titulo: Granular bed filtration of high temperature biomass gasification gas
